productos.nombre: V-Flange manual valve remote monitoring system
productos.descripcion: V-Flange is an advanced and reliable remote monitoring system designed specifically for quarter-turn valves. This innovative solution combines a robust on-valve device with an intuitive cloud dashboard, offering comprehensive monitoring without the need for an external power supply or wired connection for data transmission. Its advanced features and cloud integration ensure that end-users have all the information needed to maintain optimal valve performance and extended lifecycle, all the while reducing the need for manned inspections and interventions.

productos.descripcion: Velan’s Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) and control panels are programmed with Velan-proprietary software developed according to the best practices and procedures of the Delayed Coker industry. Velan offers end users a complete hardware and software system package designed to improve plant operations, leveraging our longstanding expertise as the leading worldwide manufacturer of severe service valves for delayed coking units.

productos.descripcion: Velan has developed highly customizable purge systems designed to optimize process conditions through precise control of temperature, flow rate, and pressure. These systems prevent clogging in the valve seat and body cavity areas while ensuring pressure balance for safe operation in various configurations. Tailored to meet specific user needs, these purge systems include specialized construction, flow rates, and equipment to maintain adequate purging fluid in critical valves. Additionally, a web-enabled panel, equipped with embedded sensors and processors, can collect, transmit, and act on data from multiple valves, ensuring efficient and reliable operation.
